props.name: created_at
props.sqlDef: created_at timestamptz not null default now()

props.name: hero_image_path
props.description: Optional hero/cover image path for the account in the 'accounts' bucket

props.name: id
props.sqlDef: id uuid not null default gen_random_uuid ()

props.name: logo_image_path
props.description: Path to the logo image in the 'accounts' bucket

name: AccountInvite
description: An invitation to join an account

props.name: account_id
props.description: The account this invite is for

props.name: created_at
props.sqlDef: created_at timestamptz not null default now()

props.name: email
props.description: Optional email address the invite targets

props.name: id
props.sqlDef: id uuid not null default gen_random_uuid ()

props.name: invite_code
props.description: The unique invite code part used in the invite URL

props.name: invited_by_user_id
props.description: The user who created the invite

props.name: is_active
props.description: If true, the invite is currently active/valid
props.sqlDef: is_active boolean not null default true

props.name: role
props.description: The role granted if the invite is accepted

name: AccountMembership
description: A membership linking a user to an account with a role

props.name: account_id
props.description: The account this membership belongs to

props.name: created_at
props.sqlDef: created_at timestamptz not null default now()

props.name: id
props.sqlDef: id uuid not null default gen_random_uuid ()

props.name: last_accessed_at
props.description: When the member last accessed the account

props.name: role
props.description: The role of the user within this account

props.name: user_id
props.description: The user this membership is for

props.name: account_id
props.description: The account this agent belongs to

props.name: created_at
props.sqlDef: created_at timestamptz not null default now()

props.name: default_sms_from
props.description: Default SMS phone number for sending (from)

props.description: The holdout percentage for control group (0-100)

props.description: If true, the agent is active

props.description: The message category (content library) assigned to this agent

name: AgentDecision
description: A recorded decision made by an agent

props.name: account_id
props.description: The account this decision belongs to

props.name: agent_id
props.description: The agent that made the decision

props.name: created_at
props.sqlDef: created_at timestamptz not null default now()

props.name: decisioned_at
props.sqlDef: decisioned_at timestamptz not null default now()

props.name: id
props.sqlDef: id uuid not null default gen_random_uuid ()

props.name: is_holdout
props.description: True if the profile was in the holdout group and no send should occur
props.sqlDef: is_holdout boolean not null default false

props.name: profile_id
props.description: The profile targeted by the decision

props.name: send_error
props.description: Optional error information if sending failed

props.name: was_sent
props.description: True if a send occurred for this decision

name: ChannelSubscription

props.description: The account this subscription belongs to

props.description: When the subscription record was created

props.sqlDef: id uuid not null default gen_random_uuid ()

props.name: is_primary
props.description: If true, this is the primary subscription for the channel

props.name: last_bounced_at
props.description: When the last bounce occurred (if any)

props.name: profile_id
props.description: The profile this subscription belongs to
